name: Crystal Chaos (Justin Searcy)
description:
*The game is slightly laggy when played in full screen, but it works fine windowed or when downloaded

Protect the crystals you need to conduct your magic rituals from the spirits attracted to their power.  Teleport the crystals out of harms way and use your fireballs to take out the spirit. Collect souls from vanquished spirits and use them at the soul well to upgrade your magic powers. Earn  points for each  enemy killed with a multiplier on that score for each crystal still active.

Controls

WASD - move

Left Click - Selects a crystal to teleport/Selects place for crystal to be teleported

Space Bar - Create a fireball and shoot is towards your mouse

E - Activate the soul well

Escape - Brings up the options menu in game
